availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred Dearing (Kenton County, Kentucky, master tailor)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, master tailor. Kentucky native. Married to Isabelle Dearing. Father of Ada Dearing, Emma Dearing, Caroline Dearing, William Dearing, and Edmund Dearing. Resident in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1850. Master tailor in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 3, p. 252A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 4, p. 662.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 5, p. 155A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994043, Kenton County Deaths, p. 289.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Kenton County Wills, vol. 7-8, 1896-1903, p. 43.
